title: Sunfire Capes should not stack Riot

replies.body:
Sunfire capes allowed to stack?

Better remove dodge runes!

And they wonder why everyone's going to leave Summoner's Rift for the new mode, Dominion.

> [{quoted}](name=Ouroboro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0WdUyAFd,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-04-20T05:01:52.337+0000)
>
> Sunfire capes allowed to stack?
> 
> Better remove dodge runes!
> 
> And they wonder why everyone's going to leave Summoner's Rift for the new mode, Dominion.

This guy gets it

> [{quoted}](name=Ouroboro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0WdUyAFd,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-04-20T05:01:52.337+0000)
>
> Sunfire capes allowed to stack?
> 
> Better remove dodge runes!
> 
> And they wonder why everyone's going to leave Summoner's Rift for the new mode, Dominion.

Yay Ouroboro joined the fun

Haven't seen you around much since the... thing

OT: IDK for Sunfire Stacks. It's when invisible champions start to do it that it gets stupid. Remove 50 second stealth Rito, wtf
They really should just rework Evelyn... I mean, all these people complain about her anyway...
still a valid point even today

> [{quoted}](name=Ouroboro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0WdUyAFd,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-04-20T05:01:52.337+0000)
>
> Sunfire capes allowed to stack?
> 
> Better remove dodge runes!
> 
> And they wonder why everyone's going to leave Summoner's Rift for the new mode, Dominion.

Dominion is so damn amazing. It's fast, it's fun, and you get very close games every time! So much better than Summoner's Rift where someone gets first blood, and then it's gg.

They don't, because unique named passives are a thing.  Surprise.

Or do you mean multiple champions having a Sunfire Cape and standing near the same target?

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0WdUyAFd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-20T03:42:19.819+0000)
>
> They don't, because unique named passives are a thing.  Surprise.
> 
> Or do you mean multiple champions having a Sunfire Cape and standing near the same target?

Um yes they do.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SVAi08_G0Tc

Take this out

That's so old, Pepperidge Farm doesn't remember it.

Quite seriously, that's back when Eve's stealth was an active effect *and* before Riot made Sunfire Cape a unique passive.

> [{quoted}](name=JustMyBassCannon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0WdUyAFd,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-04-20T03:47:05.647+0000)

" that's back when Eve's stealth was an active effect"
implying it isnt? wtf

[Sunfire Cape](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/V1.0.0.107)

[Evelynn](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/V1.0.0.143)

> [{quoted}](name=JustMyBassCannon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0WdUyAFd,comment-id=00000001000000000001,timestamp=2015-04-20T03:50:21.729+0000)

> 
> [Evelynn](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/V1.0.0.143)

We're trying to have a serious discussion, stop trolling please. To go as far as falsely editing the wiki is ridiculous.

[Sunfire Cape in old forums](http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=81484)

[Evelynn in old forums](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2372659)

It's generally not worth arguing in a troll thread, but it's near midnight and fuck if I care when I can prove it.

Bass

Dont even try this isnt worth it
No, it's not worth it. But it was near midnight, and I don't really give a damn, it's fun to brutally murder a bad attempt at slapstick humor.

I  fucking miss the old forums so much, because even though it was unmoderated (like this xD) the champion and item balance subforums had next to no traffic, and all the people there were relatively serious.
Her stealth is her passive.  Has been for quite a while.

nope
It was back when eve had a stun.

I'm fucking sick of Garen having 5 sunfires like who fucking designed this holy shit
I agree... Sick an tired of the freelo. I had an amumu with six sunfires ult on me and I actually almost cried when I saw how fast my life went away. It was emotional... Stop hurting me, Riot. Stop.

You guys are fucking scrubs just get some pink wards so you can stop her eve. 

Garen needs flat out nerfs though he's too good with sunfire capes.
Omg Riot this needs to stop wtf. I just got killed by an Eve as she just stood their and laughed. SHE LAUGHED RIOT

nerf jax too

why the fuck should he get health for building ad and ap

yeah no kidding. played Zed the other day. enemy team all turned off Shadows.

all i could do was auto attack all game. still went 32/2 though after buying all sunfires and sword of the occult for some real DPS.

So true, have an up vote +1
All these trolls saying its been patched, ive looked forever
this thread is amusing
Also, stop making Madred's Bloodrazor do half of my health every single auto attack. It's not that bad if I'm tanky, but it really hurts squishies like Magic Pen Mundo.
Nerf the capes
Im so tired of eve with 5 capes, so OP.

no idea what fake post that is, the date is ahead a few months.

also, wriggles lantern needs a buff
i remember a patch that specifically made it so that sunfires don't stack
